actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict the disclosure information by tax return preparers to third party entities and to prohibit private tax collection contracts.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Taxpayer Privacy Protection Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) prohibit tax return preparers from disclosing income tax return information to another tax return preparer or to a contractor of a tax return preparer; and (2) repeal the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to enter into qualified tax collection contracts.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict the disclosure information by tax return preparers to third party entities and to prohibit private tax collection contracts.
